mapper.select: select tsi.*, tst.sens_tp_nm from tb_sensor_info tsi left join tb_sensor_type tst on tsi.senstype_no = tst.senstype_no where tsi.sens_no in (select tlim.sens_no from tb_logr_idx_map tlim where logr_no in (select tli.logr_no from tb_district_info tdi left outer join tb_logger_info tli on tli.district_no = tdi.district_no where tdi.district_no = #{district_no})) order by tsi.senstype_no, tsi.sens_nm;

select count(*) from tb_sensor_info tsi left join tb_sensor_type tst on tsi.senstype_no = tst.senstype_no where tsi.sens_no in (select tlim.sens_no from tb_logr_idx_map tlim where logr_no in (select tli.logr_no from tb_district_info tdi left outer join tb_logger_info tli on tli.district_no = tdi.district_no where tdi.district_no = #{district_no}));
